summary: This release mostly ties up loose ends. I've consolidated the legal pages into the knowledge base, finished the Lemon Squeezy migration for payments, and fixed a handful of bugs like the TOC not working. I also restored the seasonal logo tap and added a lot of ASCII art to the spec docs.

features: add npm-publish skill for registry swap workflow
add grove-spec-writing skill for spec standardization
update nav slots terminology to curios (#329)
simplify auth to Google-only and add UX improvements
update pricing page nav pages to curios (#330)
replace Stripe with Lemon Squeezy on credits page (#331)
consolidate legal pages into knowledge base with TOC support (#334)
add ASCII visual effects library spec and documentation
update tool icons and add Patina status note
improve admin sidebar and Plant onboarding flow
restore season cycling on logo tap
fixes: correct import path for GlassLegend component (#327)
standardize header logo to toggle dark/light mode
handle legacy plain-string theme values in tenant lookup
complete Lemon Squeezy migration and fix type errors
align posts insert with database schema
unify color presets and fix settings persistence
resolve TOC clickability by fixing heading ID mismatch (#332)
remove outdated footer links from settings page (#333)
update legal links to use knowledge base routes
add code block renderer and copy button functionality
refactoring: consolidate duplicated utilities to use engine package
docs: add repository snapshot and release summary for v0.9.5
adjust formatting and spacing in spec diagrams
adjust formatting and spacing in spec diagrams
unify frontmatter across all spec files
add ASCII art headers and UI mockups across 16 specs
standardize spacing in ASCII art and UI mockups across spec files
add Plant walkthrough improvement plans to TODOS
add 19 missing specs to technical specs index (#325)
update README with new tree logo and v0.9.5 features (#326)
